dmca.title: Final Warning - GetBestInfo
dmca.body:
nc

  _____  

From: Dustin Rowles [mailto:dustin@pajiba.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, May 18, 2005 9:23 PM
To: helpdesk@bigsoccer.com; jh@redfive.com; helpdesk@getbestinfo.com;
copyright@theplanet.com; ethanBeard@gmail.com
Cc: QuizPrep@aol.com
Subject: Final Warning - GetBestInfo


To Whom It May Concern:
 
I am legal counsel for Pajiba GP, Legal Sense Publishing, and Ranks
Partnership. I have emailed several times now with regard to the flagrant
copyright violations you have displayed on your site, getbestinfo.com,
duplicating/plagiarizing the content on several other websites, including
several my companies' web properties, namely legalranks.com and
investionary.com.   
You neither asked for nor received permission to use our websites as the
basis for getbestinfo.com nor to make or distribute copies of it. Therefore,
I believe you have willfully infringed my rights under 17 USC Section 101,
et seq. and could be liable for statutory damages as high as $100,000.
I demand that you immediately cease the use and distribution of all
infringing works derived from our web properties, and all copies of it, and
that you destroy such copies immediately, and that you desist from this or
any other infringement of my rights in the future. If I have not received an
affirmative response from you by 10 a.m. EST, on May 19, 2005, indicating
that you have fully complied with these requirements, I will take the full
legal remedies available to rectify this situation, including notification
of google and its adsense program, your hosting provider, and ICANN.
Thanks for your kind and cooperative attention to this matter.
Dustin C. Rowles, Esq.
Publisher
Pajiba GP
Legal Sense Publishing
Ranks Partnership
dmca.principal_name: Dustin C. Rowles (for Pajiba GP, Legal Sense Publishing, and Ranks)
